He was a marine, a hero, and poisoned by the United States government with Agent Orange. It took 40 years for the VA to give him Hundo - then a clot shot did him in. 

He even tried escaping the hospital, but Fauci protocol remdesivir shut down his kidneys. Lungs filled up with fluid and he drowned in bed alone because no one was allowed to enter the Florida hospital room. Thanks, Covid protocols. 

We have to talk. My family all attended the Charlie Kirk memorial in Glendale Arizona. Now they hate Tucker and worship Israel. What the fuck. 

I’m sorry but I am not bowing down to some other country. I don’t care which one. I am America first and proud of it. 

This sucking other countries dicks bullshit needs to end right the fuck now. It is abundantly clear in our motto 

# AMERICA FIRST

AND Trump - dude. We believe in you. PUT AMERICA FIRST. 

Semper Fi, Dad.

posts.raw_content:
Half this site won’t be ready for this conversation but it’s time to point it out because I can’t stay quiet about it and I’ve seen people voice the same concerns in comments. 

Trump is so far off the fucking path I don’t know what the fuck he is doing anymore. Recently he has insulted Americans saying we don’t have the talent here and we need H1Bs. I’m sorry but that’s not America First or MAGA, so fuck right off with that. He’s said he wants American talent and American job but turns around and says some dumb shit like this. 

I don’t know about you guys but I voted for no new wars. We bombed Iran and now about to start shit with Venezuela. And for what? They are no threat to us. 

How about draining the swamp? It’s not being drained and it’s as swampy as ever. What happened to all this shit that was supposed to happen after say one. Epstein? He’s a dead guy now so stop asking about him and he’s a Democrat hoax. Kash said he didn’t kill himself and once he got in as FBI director he did a whole 180 about it, and amount countless other things I won’t get into. Because quite frankly, the list is too fucking long. 
Bondi is a fucking joke and slow walking every fucking thing. But is quick to hop on sandwich throwers. 

Closing the border right away was great, but now we are deporting people slower than Obama. And yes I know judges are throwing injunctions around. But they have no standing so ignore that shit. 

Also why the fuck is Trump so in love is isreal. He sucks Bibi cock as good as the next isreal shill. Is it because he’s some old boomer that’s trained to love isreal no matter what? Every time isreal needs something that puts isreal first over America, Trump is always “sir yes sir” and I’m sick of it. 

I am still MAGA and AF til the day I die. But I can’t help to see that Trump has changed and MAGA has surpassed him. There is more to list here and I’m sure some of you will point it out in the comments.Trump needs to turn this ship around self correct.

Edit: I have been here since the 2016 The Donald days and proudly voted for Trump 3 times. But I will no longer blindly follow someone that makes decisions that are clearly not America first.
